body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Ralph Mitchell and I am a customer service representative at Star Motors, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Helen. Can I have your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two zero one, three four six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you please provide your address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Main Street, Cityville, State, one zero zero two four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming. Is there anything specific you need help with today, Helen?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a billing inquiry related to my recent service appointment at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Helen. Let me assist you with that. Thank you for providing the necessary information. Is there anything else you would like to share before we proceed with the inquiry?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I feel relieved that my inquiry is being looked into.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Helen. Thank you for your time and patience. I will investigate the issue and get back to you shortly. Have a great day.
